newsitem.title: BULGARIA: ONE ROMANIAN DIES IN BUS CRASH IN BULGARIA.
newsitem.headline: ONE ROMANIAN DIES IN BUS CRASH IN BULGARIA.

text.p: One Romanian passenger was killed, and 14 others were injured on Thursday when a Romanian-registered bus collided with a Bulgarian one in northern Bulgaria, police said.
The two buses collided head on at 5 o'clock this morning on the road between the towns of Rousse and Veliko Tarnovo, police said.
A Romanian woman Maria Marco, 35, was killed. The accident was being investigated, police added. -- Sofia Newsroom, 359-2-84561
